changelogs.title: Enhanced Health Records & Task Scheduling Features
changelogs.md_description:
We've significantly enhanced our platform with new features aimed at improving user experience and data management.

- **Comprehensive Health Records**: Users can now track detailed health records for their reptiles, including veterinary visits, medication, and follow-up reminders. This feature ensures better health management with notifications for upcoming follow-ups and the ability to view veterinary and medication history.

- **Task Scheduling and Reminders**: We've implemented a robust task scheduling system that supports recurring maintenance reminders. Users can manage tasks with different priorities and receive notifications for upcoming and overdue tasks, ensuring timely care and maintenance.

- **Data Import/Export**: To facilitate data management, users can now import and export their data in JSON and CSV formats. This feature supports seamless data transfer for backup or migration purposes, enhancing data accessibility and user control.

These updates aim to streamline health management and task scheduling, providing users with tools to maintain comprehensive records and ensure timely care for their reptiles.

changelogs.title: Add dark mode support across the application
changelogs.md_description:
We've added system-wide dark mode support to improve user experience in low-light environments.

- Implemented automatic theme detection based on system preferences
- Created new dark color palette that maintains WCAG AA contrast ratios
- Added smooth transitions between light and dark modes
- Fixed several UI inconsistencies in navigation components

This completes the dark mode implementation requested in issue #42.

changelogs.title: Optimize image loading with lazy loading and WebP conversion
changelogs.md_description:
Performance improvements for image-heavy pages:

- Implemented lazy loading for all product images
- Added WebP conversion pipeline with fallbacks for older browsers
- Reduced initial page load by 42% on the product catalog
- Implemented responsive image sizing based on viewport

This addresses the performance concerns raised in issue #38.

changelogs.title: Add user profile customization options
changelogs.md_description:
Users can now personalize their profiles with several new options:

- Added custom avatar upload with cropping functionality
- Implemented theme color selection for user interfaces
- Added display name and bio fields
- Improved validation and error handling for all inputs

This completes the user customization epic from our Q2 roadmap.

changelogs.title: Implement real-time notifications system
changelogs.md_description:
Added a comprehensive real-time notification system:

- Integrated WebSocket connections for instant updates
- Created notification center UI with read/unread status
- Added different notification types (alerts, messages, system updates)
- Implemented notification preferences in user settings
- Added support for push notifications on compatible browsers

This provides the foundation for all real-time features planned in our roadmap.

changelogs.title: Revamp authentication system with OAuth support
changelogs.md_description:
Major update to our authentication system:

- Added OAuth 2.0 support for Google, GitHub, and Microsoft accounts
- Implemented PKCE flow for added security
- Added remember-me functionality with secure refresh tokens
- Redesigned login and signup flows with improved accessibility
- Enhanced password strength requirements and feedback

This change improves security while making the login process more convenient for users.

changelogs.title: Redesign dashboard with customizable widgets
changelogs.md_description:
Complete dashboard redesign with new functionality:

- Implemented drag-and-drop widget system
- Added 8 new widget types for different data visualizations
- Created widget configuration modal for customization
- Added dashboard sharing and export options
- Implemented responsive layouts for all screen sizes

This gives users much more flexibility in monitoring their key metrics.

changelogs.title: Add advanced search and filtering capabilities
changelogs.md_description:
Enhanced search functionality across the application:

- Implemented full-text search with Elasticsearch
- Added faceted filtering with dynamic options
- Created saved search feature for frequent queries
- Improved search results page with infinite scrolling
- Added keyboard shortcuts for power users

These improvements make finding content significantly faster and more intuitive.

changelogs.title: Implement data export to multiple formats
changelogs.md_description:
Users can now export their data in multiple formats:

- Added CSV, Excel, and PDF export options
- Implemented customizable field selection for exports
- Added scheduled export functionality for premium users
- Created email delivery option for large exports
- Improved data formatting for better readability

This completes the data portability requirements for GDPR compliance.

changelogs.title: Add team collaboration features
changelogs.md_description:
New collaboration features for team workspaces:

- Implemented shared workspaces with customizable permissions
- Added real-time collaboration on documents
- Created team activity dashboard
- Added @mentions and comments throughout the application
- Implemented team notifications and digest emails

These features significantly improve team productivity and communication.

changelogs.title: Improve accessibility compliance to WCAG 2.1 AA
changelogs.md_description:
Major accessibility improvements throughout the application:

- Enhanced keyboard navigation with visible focus indicators
- Improved screen reader compatibility with proper ARIA attributes
- Fixed color contrast issues across all interfaces
- Added alternative text for all images and icons
- Implemented skip navigation links for keyboard users

These changes make our application more inclusive and compliant with accessibility standards.

changelogs.title: Add multi-language support with automatic detection
changelogs.md_description:
Internationalization improvements for global users:

- Added support for 12 languages including right-to-left scripts
- Implemented automatic language detection based on browser settings
- Created language selector in user preferences
- Improved date, time, and number formatting for all locales
- Added translation management system for content editors

This expands our potential user base to non-English speaking regions.

changelogs.title: Implement API rate limiting and monitoring
changelogs.md_description:
Security and performance improvements for our API:

- Added tiered rate limiting based on user plans
- Implemented request throttling with proper 429 responses
- Created developer dashboard for API usage monitoring
- Added detailed logging for security auditing
- Improved error responses with helpful troubleshooting information

These changes protect our infrastructure while improving the developer experience.

changelogs.title: Revamp mobile responsive design
changelogs.md_description:
Complete redesign of mobile experience:

- Implemented mobile-first approach to all key workflows
- Created new navigation pattern for small screens
- Optimized touch targets for better usability
- Reduced data usage for users on limited connections
- Added offline capabilities for core functionality

Mobile users now have a first-class experience that works well on all devices.

changelogs.title: Add analytics dashboard for user insights
changelogs.md_description:
New analytics capabilities for data-driven decisions:

- Created comprehensive analytics dashboard
- Implemented customizable reporting periods
- Added exportable reports in multiple formats
- Created user journey visualization tools
- Added goal tracking and conversion funnels

These tools provide valuable insights into user behavior and business performance.

changelogs.title: Initial application release
changelogs.md_description:
First public release of our application with core features:

- User authentication and account management
- Basic dashboard with key metrics
- Profile creation and customization
- Document storage and organization
- Simple search functionality

This initial release provides the foundation for all future development.
